title: 820-01814 A1990 Potential Gmux Issue
message: [FONT=Whitney][SIZE=16px]A1990. External display works normally when eDP is unplugged. With eDP connected looks like this. Potential gmux issue? No signs of screen damage. Have yet to work on this model yet.[/SIZE][/FONT]

title: 820-01814 A1990 Potential Gmux Issue
message: Looks like this one still has Apple Care on it. Going to have customer contact Apple. But still curious what the issue is. I believe I saw Rossmann do a video where the eDP connector had debris on the backlight and data line that killed the GMUX.

title: 820-01814 A1990 Potential Gmux Issue
message: GPU issue, certainly take to Apple if it does not have liquid damage.

title: 820-01814 A1990 Potential Gmux Issue
message: Thanks Duke. The only reason I didn't suspect GPU is because with the eDP cable unplugged, using an external monitor, there were no graphical anomalies. Thankfully, this one still has a warranty until 2022.
